acts.what: AATT with HTML CodeSniffer WCAG 2.1 AA ruleset

result.msg: Interfering with a user agent's ability to zoom may be a failure of this Success Criterion.
result.code:
<meta name="viewport"
content="width=device-width,
user-scalable=no,
initial-scale=1.0,
minimum-scale=1.0,
maximum-scale=1.0">

result.msg: This element has "position: fixed". This may require scrolling in two dimensions, which is considered a failure of this Success Criterion.
If this element contains a navigation section, it is recommended that it be marked up as a list.
Img element is marked so that it is ignored by Assistive Technology.
This searchinput element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title , aria-label , aria-labelledby .
Anchor element found with an ID but without a href or link text. Consider moving its ID to a parent or nearby element.
This element has "position: fixed". This may require scrolling in two dimensions, which is considered a failure of this Success Criterion.
Anchor element found with a valid href attribute, but no link content has been supplied.

The heading structure is not logically nested. This h2 element should be an h1 to be properly nested.
Heading tag found with no content. Text that is not intended as a heading should not be marked up with heading tags.
The heading structure is not logically nested. This h4 element should be an h3 to be properly nested.
